summary: The Saving NIST’s Workforce Act, introduced in the Senate on July 31, 2025, aims to prevent job cuts at the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). The bill establishes a moratorium on any workforce reductions at NIST until full-year appropriations for fiscal year 2026 are enacted. This moratorium applies in addition to existing authorities related to personnel actions, as outlined in Title 5 of the United States Code.
